document.full_text: china pushed back against u.s. criticism of its human rights situation on friday following talks on the issue, saying that the chinese people were "most qualified" to talk on the topic and defending the detention of artist ai weiwei.
document.title: china pushes back after u.s. criticism on rights
lines_and_colors: china pushed back against u.s. criticism of its human rights situation on friday following talks on the issue, saying that the chinese people were "most qualified" to talk on the topic and defending the detention of artist ai weiwei.
